extree_pointer.description: Pointer to the execution tree node in the format 'extree_id/node_id'.

petri_net_dot.description: A string representation of the Petri net in DOT format, used for visualization.

bpmn_dot.description: A string representation of the BPMN in DOT format, used for visualization.

extree_dot.description: A string representation of the execution tree in DOT format, used for visualization.
